luawhile.luawhile:
a=10
while( a < 20 )
do
   print("a 的值为:", a)
   a = a+1
end
luawhile.luafor:
for i=1,f(x) do
    print(i)
end
 
for i=10,1,-1 do
    print(i)
end
luawhile.luarepeat:
a = 10
repeat
   print("a:", a)
   a = a + 1
until( a > 15 )

luaif.luaelse:
a = 100;
if( a < 20 )
then
   print("a < 20" )
else
   print("a > 20" )
end
print("a:", a)
